results.title: Gram Panchayat (ग्राम पंचायत): GHOORA (घूरा )
results.content: Overview. Ghoora (घूरा) Gram Panchayat is a Rural Local Body in Rajnagar Panchayat Samiti part of Chhatarpur Zila Parishad. There are total 1 Villages under Ghoora Gram Panchayat jurisdiction. Gram Panchayat Rajnagar is further divided into 20 Wards. Gram Panchayat Rajnagar has total 2 elected members by people. Gram Panchayat Rajnagar has total 4 schools.

results.title: Ghor Province - Wikipedia
results.content: Ghōr, also spelled Ghowr or Ghur (Dari: غور), is one of the thirty-four provinces of Afghanistan. It is located in the western Hindu Kush in central Afghanistan, towards the northwest.
